means: 断言，坚称，有实证的陈述

sentence.Network_en: Everybody agree them, without Joan, she is having averment.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有人都同意, 除了贞德, 她申辩着.

sentence.Network_en: Please sign the letter of statement and averment.
sentence.Network_cn: 请在陈述申辩书上签字(盖章).

list.abs: I aver it will not rain tomorrow ., 我断言明天不会下雨.
还有一些使用avere的短语,和法语蛮像的:  avere fame 感到饥饿  avere sete 感到口渴  avere caldo 感到暖和  avere freddo 感到寒冷  avere fretta 匆忙.
cake_半堂 shufa_百度空间 ... antimony cake 锑饼 aver cake 燕麦饼 banbury cake 班伯里加料夹心饼.
natural death 死于自然negative averment 否定的声言neglect of duty 疏忽职守

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French averrement, averement, from averer 'declare true' (see aver)

means.word_mean: 1. a declaration that is made emphatically (as if no supporting evidence were necessary)

auth_sentence.content: Guilty, in the averment of this jury of peers, and of a certainty.
auth_sentence.res_content: Guilty, in the averment of this jury of peers, and of a certainty.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Guilty, in the averment of this jury of peers, and of a certainty.
